vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway1.redeem (patch_8.sol#9-14) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_8.sol#11)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_8.sol#12)

external-function
external-function

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_8.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway1.execute (patch_8.sol#26-29):
	-require(bool)(destination.call.value(msg.value)(data)) patch_8.sol#28
